In His providence, God is saying, as He has been saying for years past: Here is a field for you to work. Those who are wise in agricultural lines, in tilling the soil, those who can construct simple, plain buildings, may help. They can do good work, and at the same time show in their characters the high morality which it is the privilege of this people to attain to. Teach 
                                                                           64
them the truth in simple object-lessons. Make everything upon which they lay their hands a lesson in character-building.
